DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, draw 1 extra card for each Speed and gain negative effects based on your Speed. NL 3+: Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL 5+: Lose 2 Dexterity this turn only. NL 7+: Lose 2 Traction this turn only.

DrifterMod:TractionPotion.NAME: Wheel Grease
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain Block and deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP equal to your #yDrift. When you #yDrift, gain #yMomentum (Max 2.) which maintains your #yDrift.
